required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A RCT for Y-Knot All-suture Anchor in Ankle Ligaments Injury Repair
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-center, Randomized Controlled Trial to Evaluate the Effectiveness and Safety of Y-Knot All-suture Anchor in Ankle Ligaments Injury Repair

brief_summary.textblock: Purpose of this study is to evaluate the effectiveness and safety of Y-Knot all-suture anchor by comparing patients' clinical outcome after ankle ligaments repair surgery.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From pre-operation to 3 and 6 months postoperative

intervention.description: Y-knot all-suture anchor will be implanted to participants
Biocomposite suture anchor will be implanted to participants
